Installation¶

PyPI¶

The auviewer Python package may be installed from PyPI with:

pip install auviewer

Requires Python 3.8

Building from Source¶

You may build from source using the bash script tools/rebuild.

Portions of AUViewer are written in Cython, which compiles into C code. The .c files are included in source so that running the Cython compilation is not necessary to build from source. However, if you wish to re-compile the Cython code, ensure that Cython is installed, and set RECOMPILE_CYTHON = False in setup.py.
